page.content: {Have Fothergill & Harvey played any {part in the social work- that is the {well being of its employees? }Yes Fothergill & Harvey back even before I came had canteens and they used to have medical people to look after the work people.They also built houses for their employees i.e.Timbercliffe and Dean head.{Fothergill & Harvey is {so important to our area do you think {it can survive?How do you think it can {continue to do so?}Well,I think the survival will come about through the people that are at the top now-who look for needs of industry in the future.They try to develop materials for the future and if they can do that and the work-force is willing to adapt to changes in their jobs then Fothergill and Harvey's will survive. { }
